paper_abstract: Skowron's discernibility matrix is one of representative approaches in computing relative core and relative reducts, while redundant information is also involved. To decrease the complexity of computation, the idea of granular computing is applied to lower the rank of discernibility matrix. In addition, the absorptivity based on bit-vector computation is proposed to simplify computation of relative core and relative reducts.
paper_title: Application of granular computing in knowledge reduction
